price: Lao wao humo ni kupiga mayowe, na wala hawatasikia (jenginelo).
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ
footnotes: Humo watatoa pumzi zitokazo vifuani kwa sauti kama ya mwenye kukabwa, kwa dhiki watayo pata, na hawatasikia la kuwafurahisha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā zafīrun wahum fīhā lā yasmaʿūna
